text: List of the published work of George Packer, American journalist, novelist, and playwright. ==Books== * * * * * * * * * * ;Reprints * ==Essays and reporting== * Hillary Clinton stepping down as Secretary of State. * Boston Marathon bombing * * * * * * Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant. * * * Online version is titled "A spymaster opens up". * Online version is titled "The end of the American Century". * Online version is titled "Doublethink is stronger than Orwell imagined". ==Notes== Category:Bibliographies by writer Category:Bibliographies of American writers
